title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.29 - Eligible uses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.29 - Eligible uses

State Regulations
(a) Program
funds for commercial area development financing projects may be used for: (1)
new construction, renovation or leasehold
improvements; (2)
the soft costs
related to any of the above uses; and
(3)
preliminary planning, including
feasibility studies and surveys and reports. (b) Program funds for commercial area
development financing may not be used for any ineligible
cost. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4243.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
